item.title: We are deeply concerned about Shopify’s transition to Shopify Flow for abandoned cart emails, which has significantly impacted merchants operating in...
item.description: We are deeply concerned about Shopify’s transition to Shopify Flow for abandoned cart emails, which has significantly impacted merchants operating in multiple languages. The previous notification system handled multilingual workflows seamlessly, allowing businesses to provide localized experiences for their customers. However, Shopify Flow lacks native multilanguage support, forcing merchants to adopt a more complex and less effective solution. This abrupt change disrupts established workflows, increases the effort required to manage simple tasks, and risks alienating customers who receive communications in the wrong language. We urge Shopify to reintroduce native multilanguage capabilities or provide flexibility to continue using the previous system, ensuring that all merchants can maintain high standards of customer engagement and trust.

item.title: Real mixed bag here. Flow has become an integral part of how we operate our store but my god is it frustrating to use at times. I'm here today writing...
item.description: Real mixed bag here. Flow has become an integral part of how we operate our store but my god is it frustrating to use at times. I'm here today writing this review out of frustration at recent depreciations. Flow needs to warn us when things are changing instead of just pushing out updates and letting us find out when we go to create new flows or update old ones. I know there is a five star app here but it needs work to show it. Giving it 4 stars because the app is capable of a lot and I'm glad we have it despite the rough edges.
